content.question: Green Revolution technology has resulted in which of the following in modernagriculture?

choices.label: The development of high-yield grains and the expansion of cultivated areas
The construction of new irrigation systems and a reduction in the use of fertilizers
An increase in the circulation of investment capital to help the poorest farmers
The loss of prime agricultural land and smaller yields from grain crops
The end of famine in the world

content.answer: The development of high-yield grains and the expansion of cultivated areas

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
